name: Deep Space Ravager Evolutiuon
description:
A game for the "One Buttom Game Jam". You control the ship pressing any buttom from your keyboard or mouse. Each time you press it, the ship will change the side that are moving (from  right to left and left to right) and at the same will shoot a torpedo to destroy enemy ships. 

Have fun with this endeless space shooter game. Please, report any bugs.
